login.title: Login · $t(app.name)
login.heading: 👋 Welcome back!
login.description: Log in to your account or <1>create an account</1>

signUp.title: $t(signUp.heading) · $t(app.name)
signUp.heading: Create an account
signUp.description: Start a 14-day trial with all features unlocked.
signUp.name: Name
signUp.invalidPassword: Password must be at least 8 characters, and at least 1 uppercase, 1 lowercase and 1 number.
signUp.agreeWith: By signing up, you agree to our <1>terms of service</1> and <3>privacy policy</3>.

forgotPassword.title: Forgot password · $t(app.name)
forgotPassword.heading: Forgot password?
forgotPassword.description: We'll send you an email with verification code.

resetPassword.title: $t(resetPassword.heading) · $t(app.name)
resetPassword.heading: Reset password
resetPassword.description: We've sent you an email with a 6-digit verification code, please check your inbox at
